headline: Legal Professional

experiences.title: Senior Engineer
experiences.description: Led compliance-focused initiatives within large-scale technical teams. Advised on regulatory, legal, and risk considerations for complex systems. Worked at the intersection of law, technology, and governance.

experiences.title: Consultant
experiences.description: Provided legal and strategic consulting for early-stage companies. Supported contract review, compliance, and operational risk management. Engaged with cross-functional and international stakeholders.
